parse.title: 模块:碧蓝航线:阵营信息

wikitext.*:
--模块:蓝航线:阵营信息
local team_name={}

function team_name.getname(frame)
--阵营名称
	--转换为字符串对象（临时参数），必填。
        local name=frame.args[1]
        --字符串转小写，需要补充新内容请在find函数中使用小写
	name=string.lower(name)
	--白鹰联邦
	if (string.find(name,"eagle") or string.find(name,"白鹰") )
		then
			name="Eagle"
		do return name
	end
	--皇家海军
	elseif(string.find(name,"royal")or string.find(name,"皇家") )
		then
			name="Royal"
			do return name
	end
	--重樱帝国
	elseif(string.find(name,"sakura")or string.find(name,"重樱")or string.find(name,"重櫻"))
		then
			name="Sakura"
			do return name
	end
	--铁血阵营
	elseif(string.find(name,"metalblood")or string.find(name,"铁血")or string.find(name,"德棍")or string.find(name,"鐵血") )
		then
			name="Metalblood"
			do return name
	end
	--东煌古国
	elseif(string.find(name,"eastern")or string.find(name,"radiance")or string.find(name,"东煌")or string.find(name,"東煌") )
		then
			name="Eastern"
			do return name
	end
	--北方联合
	elseif(string.find(name,"north")or string.find(name,"北方联合")or string.find(name,"北方聯合") )
		then
			name="North"
			do return name
	end
	--自由鸢尾
	elseif(string.find(name,"Iris")or string.find(name,"自由鸢尾")or string.find(name,"自由鳶尾") )
		then
			name="Iris"
			do return name
	end
	--超次元游戏海王星
	elseif(string.find(name,"hyperdimension")or string.find(name,"neptunia")or string.find(name,"海王星") )
		then
			name="Neptunia"
			do return name
	end
		--传颂之物
	elseif(string.find(name,"Utawarerumono")or string.find(name,"传颂")or string.find(name,"傳頌") )
		then
			name="Utawarerumono"
			do return name
	end
	--无阵营
	elseif(string.find(name,"none")or string.find(name,"无阵营")or string.find(name,"無陣營")or string.find(name,"布里神教") )
		then
			name="None"
			do return name end
	end
end
	function team_name.getchinesename(frame)
	local name=team_name.getname(frame)
	if(name=="Eagle")
		then
			name="白鹰联邦"
			do return name
			end
	elseif(name=="Royal")
		then
		 name="皇家海军"
	     do return name
	end
	elseif(name=="Sakura")
		then
		 name="重樱帝国"
	     do return name
	end
	elseif(name=="Metalblood")
		then
		 name="铁血阵营"
	     do return name
	end
	elseif(name=="Eastern")
		then
		 name="东煌古国"
	     do return name
	end
	elseif(name=="North")
		then
		 name="北方联合"
	     do return name
	end
		elseif(name=="Iris")
		then
		 name="自由鸢尾"
	     do return name
	end
	elseif(name=="Neptunia")
		then
		 name="超次元游戏海王星"
	     do return name
	end
		elseif(name=="Utawarerumono")
		then
		 name="传颂之物"
	     do return name
	end
	elseif(name=="None")
		then
		 name="无阵营"
	     do return name
	end
	else
	return "不可用"
	end
end

return team_name
